name: Portfolio | Angular+17
description: personal website showcasing my projects, skills, and achievements. Built with Angular and TypeScript, it features a responsive design, intuitive navigation using routing, and a clean, professional interface to highlight my work and expertise.

name: Travel-Everywhere | Angular
description: The app provides users with a seamless experience for exploring and booking flights, including advanced filtering and search options based on airline preferences, transit options, and airport details. Designed to deliver an efficient and engaging user experience with responsive design and smooth navigation.

name: Angular Note App
description: A feature-rich note-taking application where users can create, edit, and delete notes with ease. Each note is uniquely identified for efficient management. The app includes advanced features like sorting, filtering, lazy loading, responsive design, and animations for an intuitive user experience.

name: Eshraq Alazhar Academy | ITI Graduation Project
description: A comprehensive Islamic academy platform for teaching Quran to non-Arab students. Built with modern technologies, the platform provides a smooth learning experience with features like responsive design, context-based state management, and efficient routing.

name: Responsive Landing Page
description: A professionally designed responsive landing page built using the Bootstrap framework. It incorporates clean code and interactive elements, ensuring compatibility across all devices and screen sizes.

name: Responsive Landing Page
description: A sleek and minimalist responsive landing page crafted with HTML5 and CSS3. It showcases a clean layout and ensures optimal viewing across various devices.
